Class SkillUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.skills.SkillUtils

  • public class SkillUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    An util class for working with skill and weapon meachanics.

    Wauzmons

    • Method Detail

      • isValidAttackTarget

        public static boolean isValidAttackTarget(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Determines if given entity should be targetable. This is defined by the aqua color for the levels in their name. Armor stands are never classified as attack targets.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to target.
        Returns:
        If the entity is targetable.

      • getTargetInLine

        public static org.bukkit.entity.Entity getTargetInLine(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                       int range)
        Determines the first target in the line of sight of the player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that is targeting.
        range - The range of the line in blocks.
        Returns:
        The target, or null if no valid target was found.

        Parameters:

        amplifier - The strength of the effect. (Starts at 0)

      • callPlayerMagicDamageEvent

        public static void callPlayerMagicDamageEvent(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                              java.util.List<org.bukkit.entity.Entity> entities,
                                              double damageMultiplier)
        Calls a damage event with a damage multiplier, for magic attacks, hitting multiple enemies.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who casted the attack.
        entities - The entities that got hit by the attack.
        damageMultiplier - The magic multiplier of the damage.
        See Also:
        callPlayerMagicDamageEvent(Player, Entity, double)

      • callPlayerDamageOverTimeEvent

        public static void callPlayerDamageOverTimeEvent(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                 org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                                                 org.bukkit.Color color,
                                                 int damage,
                                                 int ticks,
                                                 int interval)
        Calls a damage event, that deals damage based on a specified interval.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who casted the attack.
        entity - The entity that got hit by the attack.
        color - The color of the damage particles.
        damage - The fixed damage value.
        ticks - How often the damage should be dealt.
        interval - The server ticks between each damage.

      • spawnTotem

        public static void spawnTotem(org.bukkit.entity.Player owner,
                              org.bukkit.Material material,
                              SkillUtils.TotemRunnable runnable,
                              int ticks,
                              int interval)
        Spawns a totem to execute a runnable based on a specified interval.
        Parameters:
        owner - The player who summoned the totem.
        material - The material of the totem head.
        runnable - The runnable that should be executed.
        ticks - How often the runnable should be executed.
        interval - The server ticks between each execution.

      • spawnTower

        public static void spawnTower(org.bukkit.entity.Player owner,
                              org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack headItemStack,
                              org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack bodyItemStack,
                              SkillUtils.TotemRunnable runnable,
                              int ticks,
                              int interval)
        Spawns a tower (big totem) to execute a runnable based on a specified interval.
        Parameters:
        owner - The player who summoned the tower.
        headItemStack - The head of thr tower.
        bodyItemStack - The body of the tower.
        runnable - The runnable that should be executed.
        ticks - How often the runnable should be executed.
        interval - The server ticks between each execution.

                                   int interval)
